trans-unit.source: Specifies the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
trans-unit.target: 指定对同一文档执行 XML 数字签名和 XML 加密操作时这两项操作的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> class provides a transform that determines the order of XML Digital Signature and XML Encryption operations when both are performed on the same document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform>类提供了一种确定 XML 数字签名和 XML 加密操作的顺序，同时执行同一文档时的转换。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> class whenever you need to perform XML encryption and apply an XML digital signature to the same XML document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform>类无论何时需要执行 XML 加密并将 XML 数字签名应用于同一个 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
trans-unit.target: 必须传递<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>对象传递给<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A>包含所需的密钥信息来解密文档的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing
trans-unit.target: 要从处理中排除的统一资源标识符 (URI)

trans-unit.source: Adds a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to exclude from processing.
trans-unit.target: 添加要从处理中排除的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uri" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> 对象，该对象包含有关解密 XML 文档所必需的密钥的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> object that contains information about the keys necessary to decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关解密 XML 文档所必需的密钥信息的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: You must pass an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A> property that contains the necessary key information to decrypt the document.
trans-unit.target: 必须传递<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>对象传递给<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.EncryptedXml%2A>包含所需的密钥信息来解密文档的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的参数的 XML 表示形式，适合以 XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> 元素的子元素的形成来包含这些参数。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: XML 节点的列表，这些节点表示描述 XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> 元素中当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象所需的特定于转换的内容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> 对象的输出。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> 对象的输出。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> 对象的输出。

trans-unit.source: A decryption key could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 未能找到解密密钥。

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的输出的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 是此参数的唯一有效类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> 对象的输出。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform" /> 对象的输出。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 参数不是一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> 方法的有效输入。

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的一个有效输入类型数组；只能将属于这些类型之一的对象传递给当前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property must contain at least one element because every <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object must accept at least one type as valid input.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数组<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A>属性必须包含至少一个元素，因为每个<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform>对象必须接受至少一种类型作为有效输入。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform> object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform>对象通常接受一个或多个以下类型作为输入： <xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object with an ID attribute to compare with <c>idValue</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 对象，它具有与 <c>idValue</c> 进行比较的 ID 特性。

trans-unit.source: The value to compare with the ID attribute of <c>inputElement</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>inputElement</c> 的 ID 特性进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the ID attribute of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object matches a specified value.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 对象的 ID 特性是否与指定值匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ID attribute of the <paramref name="inputElement" /> parameter matches the <paramref name="idValue" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="inputElement" /> 参数的 ID 特性与 <paramref name="idValue" /> 参数匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object that specifies transform-specific content for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 对象，它指定当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的特定于转换的内容。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element and configures the internal state of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object to match the <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 对象分析为 <see langword="<Transform>" /> 元素的特定于转换的内容，并配置当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的内部状态以匹配 <see langword="<Transform>" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于处理的子元素`<Transform>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nodeList" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未在 <paramref name="nodeList" /> 中找到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象的统一资源标识符 (URI) 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The length of the URI value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nodeList" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象的 URI 值的长度为 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The first character of the URI value of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object in <paramref name="nodeList" /> is not '#'.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nodeList" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象的 URI 值的第一个字符不是“#”。

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要加载到当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象中的输入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，将指定的输入加载到当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 输入对象的类型必须是中的类型之一<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.InputTypes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> 方法的可能输出。

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 对象的一个有效输出类型数组；从当前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.GetOutput" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform" /> 方法只返回属于这些类型之一的对象。

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.OutputTypes%2A> property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数组<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDecryptionTransform.OutputTypes%2A>属性必须包含至少一个元素，因为每个转换必须生成至少一种类型作为输出。
